column4: eido:use a live cd ab update initramfs from chroot environment
I am at the livecd root in initramfs
what would I need to type to start
i am not sure how to relaunch a failed live boot
yes, I see the live directory structure but don't know how to re load
in live cd, open a terminal ..
all I have is initramfs I can switch consoles but no change
didn't you say you already were in live ?
the live boot bombed and dumped me to intiramfs which seems to have minimal bash function
I see, gotta try boot options , then.. kinda machine ? hardy or ibex ?

I made a bootable usb with eeebuntu since no cd-rom on the netbook.  can boot with standard 8.10 but no nic wireless or wired and so much tweeking is needed so I went with eeebuntu which should work out of the box but i get dumped to initramfs

thanks I found found lots of documentation on configuring the eee to work.  my particular model does not have wired or wireless working so this documentation seems lacking compared to others.  i was more concerned with try to load a kernel at initramfs
I cannot get to the boot options it dumps within a few seconds
thanks I tried but it doesn't seem to give me enough time but I lll try again
